thread.title: Loeb Term Solutions Participates in Loan for Food Processor, Specialty Retailer
thread.title_full: Loeb Term Solutions Participates in Loan for Food Processor, Specialty Retailer

title: Loeb Term Solutions Participates in Loan for Food Processor, Specialty Retailer
text:
Loeb Term Solutions Participates in Loan for Food Processor, Specialty Retailer July 20, 2015, 06:48 AM 
Loeb Term Solutions recently participated in providing an equipment term loan to a Midwest food manufacturing, distribution, retail company specializing in artisan foods. The client was in need of additional working capital to restructure debt and expand their operations. Loeb Term Solutions provided a term loan on the equipment valued at over $3.7 Million.
